Tasks to perform

You are asked to open the book on writing [R progrmming for data science book](https://leanpub.com/rprogramming) by [Dr Peng's](https://rdpeng.org/), then created  an R markdown file, give a name and save the file.
Please focus on the chapters 6 and 7 of the book and follow the outline that includes as headers the following to build up you file. Scientific question, Data analysis, Splitting the Dataset, Exploratory Data Analysis, Statistical Modeling, Interpreting Results,Challenge the Findings, Synthesizing Results. Make sure you respect the level of the headers and create a code chunk when computations happened.
Where, the author mentioned about the data available to use please use an hyperlink to link that data to the package mentioned in the book.
